description: This file defines an Angular component `RecipeListComponent` that displays a list of recipes fetched from a service. It manages loading states, error handling, and integrates a child component `RecipeCardComponent` for rendering individual recipes.

classes.name: RecipeListComponent
classes.description: An Angular component responsible for fetching and displaying a list of recipes, handling loading and error states, and managing component lifecycle.

methods.name: loadRecipes
methods.description: Fetches recipes from the RecipeService and updates loading/error states; subscribes to the recipes Observable.

methods.name: retryLoad
methods.description: Retries loading recipes, typically after an error.

methods.name: trackByRecipeId
methods.description: A trackBy function for ngFor directive to optimize rendering by recipe ID.
